quote: Alexia figured, delightedly, that this meant he did, in fact, tend to traipse around his private apartments in the altogether. Marriage was becoming more and more of an attractive prospect.
quote_letters: ALEXIA FIGURED DELIGHTEDLY THAT THIS MEANT HE DID IN FACT TEND TO TRAIPSE AROUND HIS PRIVATE APARTMENTS IN THE ALTOGETHER MARRIAGE WAS BECOMING MORE AND MORE OF AN ATTRACTIVE PROSPECT

clues.clue: obtaining something by means of effort.
done by machines, without human intervention.
a mark or impression made on a surface or object.
waste material dropped in public places.
an organization that helps people in need.
appealing or pleasing in a way that creates interest.
a violent uprising against an authority or government.
using the right hand more skillfully than the left.
a hebrew prophet and author of the book of isaiah in the old testament.
the process of increasing in size or developing.
a city in alberta, canada.
improved sound or image quality of a previously recorded work.
characteristic of the ancient spartans; marked by simplicity and avoidance of comfort.
a state in southern mexico.

chat:
getting: Obtaining something by means of effort.
automated: Done by machines, without human intervention.
imprint: A mark or impression made on a surface or object.
litter: Waste material dropped in public places.
charity: An organization that helps people in need.
attractive: Appealing or pleasing in a way that creates interest.
revolt: A violent uprising against an authority or government.
right-handed: Using the right hand more skillfully than the left.
isaiah: A Hebrew prophet and author of the Book of Isaiah in the Old Testament.
growth: The process of increasing in size or developing.
edmonton: A city in Alberta, Canada.
remastered: Improved sound or image quality of a previously recorded work.
spartan: Characteristic of the ancient Spartans; marked by simplicity and avoidance of comfort.
oaxaca: A state in southern Mexico.
unspecified: Not stated or described in detail.
lambeth: A district in south London, England.
latino: A person of Latin American origin or descent.
emerge: Come into view or become visible.
spearheaded: Lead an enterprise or movement.
spin-off: A byproduct or result of a larger project or initiative.
